parts.text:
Magpie

```json
{
  "application": "Magpie",
  "description": "Magpie is a suite of scripts designed to run Hadoop on traditional HPC systems.",
  "software_dependencies": [
    "Hadoop",
    "Tensorflow",
    "Horovod",
    "MPI",
    "Python",
    "SLURM"
  ],
  "resource_requirements": {
    "nodes": "<my_node_count>",
    "time": "<my_time_in_minutes> minutes",
    "job_name": "<my_job_name>",
    "partition": "<my_partition>",
    "local_scratch": "/tmp/${USER}/magpie"
  },
  "configuration_options": [
    "MAGPIE_SCRIPTS_HOME",
    "MAGPIE_LOCAL_DIR",
    "MAGPIE_JOB_TYPE",
    "MAGPIE_JOB_SCRIPT",
    "MAGPIE_STARTUP_TIME",
    "MAGPIE_SHUTDOWN_TIME",
    "MAGPIE_ONE_TIME_RUN",
    "MAGPIE_PRE_JOB_RUN",
    "MAGPIE_POST_JOB_RUN",
    "MAGPIE_PRE_EXECUTE_RUN",
    "MAGPIE_POST_EXECUTE_RUN",
    "MAGPIE_PYTHON",
    "TENSORFLOW_HOROVOD_SETUP",
    "TENSORFLOW_HOROVOD_LOCAL_DIR",
    "TENSORFLOW_HOROVOD_JOB",
    "MAGPIE_TF_SYNTHETIC_BENCHMARK_PARAMETERS",
    "MAGPIE_TF_CNN_BENCHMARK_PY_FILE",
    "MAGPIE_TF_CNN_BENCHMARK_PARAMETERS",
    "TENSORFLOW_HOROVOD_SCRIPT_PATH",
    "MPIRUN_OPTIONS"
  ]
}
```
